name: Humanoid Golem

pages.text: Humanoid golem is a player-like golem. It can use armor, meelee weapons, bows, crossbows, trident, and shield. Right click the golem with equipments to equip, and shift-right click the golem to un-equip all. If you shift-right click with empty hand, the golem will be retrieved naked as well. Right click the golem with empty hand to retrieve the golem with equipments stored within.
Humanoid golem can perform area attack if and only if it holds a sword-like item.$(br2)Humanoid golem can use shield, trident, bow, and crossbow.

Equip a zombie head / skeleton skull / wither skeleton skull named as a player in Golem Skin slot to use player skin.$(br2)Requires the player to have a valid Minecraft account, and requires internet connection to download skins from Minecraft Server.

Equip a player head / piglin skull in Golem Skin slot, named as the texture location of a humanoid texture, to use a custom texture for the golem.$(br2)Use player head for slim player model, and piglin head for normal player model.

pages: If Touhou Little Maid is installed, Garage Kit can be plced in Golem Skin slot to use the Maid model as well.
